Condition_summary_1: offsetting measures must be completed during construction phase and meet criteria in the proponent’s plan
Condition_summary_2: annual monitoring reports required, including fish rescue details and photos
Condition_summary_3: no adverse impact on offsetting measures; compliance with other regulations and sara
Condition_summary_4: authorization cannot be transferred without dfo notification
Offset_footprint_size: 880 m2 (river habitat from old dam removal), 400 m2 (walleye spawning habitat), 895 m2 (shoreside/upperland), 720 m2 (lake to river habitat)
Boulder: additional boulders to resist displacement if spawning areas wash out (contingency)
